des: "This is an odd combination of ingredients, but ends up being a cool, refreshing, and healthy salad. I learned the recipe from my sister, who never used measurements, so measure according to your taste, and use whatever veggies you like."
ins: In a medium size mixing bowl combine tofu, carrots, cucumber, green onions, assorted vegetables, black olives, teriyaki sauce and Dijon mustard. Mix well.
